snippet: After 20 years, Fred Wesley, Pee Wee Ellis and Maceo Parker, former mainstays of James Brown’s band, will play together at Town Hall on Thursday.
lead_paragraph: After 20 years, Fred Wesley, Pee Wee Ellis and Maceo Parker, former mainstays of James Brown’s band, will play together at Town Hall on Thursday.

headline.main: Godsons of Soul Reunite to Toot Their Horns
headline.print_headline: Godsons of Soul Reunite to Toot Their Horns
headline.seo: Fred Wesley, Pee Wee Ellis and Maceo Parker Reunite
